name: Hotdog Rat
description:
Hotdog Rat has summoned you traveler!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - jump (can wall jump up to 2 times)
  • F - To Pause
  • E & Q - To Switch weapons (available after the Hotdog Rat)
  • Left Click to shoot, or interact with dialogue

Tips:

  • You can wall Jump and Red objects, after the Hotdog Rat Room, are climbable.
  • This is NOT a finished game, however, there is an end-ish.
